June 3, 2022

City At Night Is Opening Its Sibling Bar Called ‘Afterlight’ Next Thursday

Mark your calendars; on Thursday, June 9, 2022, City At Night will officially be opening its sibling bar! Christened Afterlight, the underground lounge & listening bar will welcome some of the Canadian Capital's most prominent DJs/producers. These highly-anticipated events will take place exclusively on week nights. Check it out!

Read more →
May 31, 2022

PMP Records Reveals Brand-New Show Series Christened 'KULTURE'

Mark your calendars; the first-ever edition of KULTURE will take place on Friday, July 29, 2022! The highly-anticipated event will happen in a large warehouse space, and will welcome bass house, bassline, and tech house artists to Ottawa.

One of Canada's rising superstars GESES gave us an exclusive glimpse into how his remix of Laidback Luke and Eva Simons' track 'Flexin'' came to be. Check out what he shared with us, and give the high-energy single a listen!
